description: When editing is complete, you can export IconUtils projects to icon files, cursor files ( .CUR , .ANI ), icon library files ( .ICL ), or cursor library files ( .CL ). They can also be exported to several standard bitmap graphic formats.
NOTE: ICPR files are actually saved by IconLover, a program included with the IconUtils software package. Other Aha-Soft applications can also save ICPR files, including ArtIcons Pro.
